title: kuklovod1n
author: kuklovod1n
content: What happened: I not bet in bookmaker long time. But when i check email. i have promo from Fortunejack - bet 2 days with minimal amount 5 mbtc and we give you 5 mbtc freebetIt looks good deal.I bet first day 2000 trx  and loseafter i bet second day and lose again 1777 trxwas unlucky. but i still have a chance with bonus freebetBut NO. they say that not want credit freebet for my account!when i ask why   and they answer - "because our team not want do this"a clever trick when the bookmaker lured me with a bonus and refused to give it!Scammerss Profile link : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=303298you can tell that this bookmaker has a very good reputation and has been proven over the years! But you are wrong!There are a lot of negative reviews about how this bookmaker deceives people under a fictitious pretext!In my case, the bookmaker does not want to give the reason why he refuses to pay!Amount Scammed: 3777 TRXPayment method: TRXChat logs and losing amount (in bet history) :  https://prnt.sc/Y5OLQbAxVbRSAdditional Notes: as I said - if not for the promised bonus, I would not bet! It was like a deal - I will bet only because the freebet is promised!If you cheated me with a bonus, then you must return my deposits and cancel all bets! It will be fair!You say that the bets are made fairly, but we will not give you a bonus and do not name the reason! So you are scammers!And I want to get you a red flag!The bookmaker obviously could not keep up with its competitors, the offers were much worse than those of others and, as a result, lost all customers. Now he began to deceive even his only customers!This is what happens when a bad manager runs a company - it closes and deceives all its customers!p.s.  https://prnt.sc/anlkLf5hp0z8

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: kuklovod1n on July 15, 2022, 09:44:28 AMChat logs and losing amount (in bet history) :  https://prnt.sc/Y5OLQbAxVbRSIt would be better if you can show the full discussion from the beginning. I'm sure there is a specific valid reason why they cant give you the bonus, it is just weird if you say that the reason is that they dont want to do it. As long as I know, there are always requirements/rules for every promotion in Fortunejack. Did you do something against the rules?

comments.author: kuklovod1n
comments.body: Quote from: Bitinity on July 15, 2022, 11:02:21 AMQuote from: kuklovod1n on July 15, 2022, 09:44:28 AMChat logs and losing amount (in bet history) :  https://prnt.sc/Y5OLQbAxVbRSIt would be better if you can show the full discussion from the beginning. I'm sure there is a specific valid reason why they cant give you the bonus, it is just weird if you say that the reason is that they dont want to do it. As long as I know, there are always requirements/rules for every promotion in Fortunejack. Did you do something against the rules? I really hope that Fortunejack will write here why they did it!because they not answered me!as you can see in the screenshot https://prnt.sc/cM5qCRnI5FnV , they write to me that there are no restrictions on my account and I can continue to use it!however, they just fooled me!

comments.author: kuklovod1n
comments.body: Quote from: Wapfika on July 15, 2022, 11:56:22 AMCan you provide the exact ToS for the bonus they offered. This is an exclusive offer so you are the only one who can see the complete terms. And also provide the full discussion with the support so that we can properly assess your situation. You seems satisfied the 0.005BTC minimum bet per day requirements but I want to know if they have specific sport or odds for that bonus to become eligible. The support might explain this to you on the snip part.https://prnt.sc/PeRlDW4DIG1Uexclusive offer may beand easy rulesi fulfilled the condition 100%

comments.author: kuklovod1n
comments.body: Quote from: Wapfika on July 15, 2022, 12:52:46 PMQuote from: kuklovod1n on July 15, 2022, 12:27:25 PMQuote from: Wapfika on July 15, 2022, 11:56:22 AMCan you provide the exact ToS for the bonus they offered. This is an exclusive offer so you are the only one who can see the complete terms. And also provide the full discussion with the support so that we can properly assess your situation. You seems satisfied the 0.005BTC minimum bet per day requirements but I want to know if they have specific sport or odds for that bonus to become eligible. The support might explain this to you on the snip part.https://prnt.sc/PeRlDW4DIG1Uexclusive offer may beand easy rulesi fulfilled the condition 100%I see. This is interesting and thanks for providing the rules screenshot. Now provide the full conversation of the support with so that we can verify whether the support handle ypur case properly or not. Fortunejack will answer here once they see this thread. We just need to be clear on what really happened before we conclude. Maybe this issue is with the support alone or something else. Fortunejack is fair, they will resolve this properly if you really comply to the tos of that bonus.https://prnt.sc/Tmeq5YRYBU1FTHis is our team decision and this is final !     -  mean -   we are happy take your money and go away!

Fortunejack is fair, they will resolve this properly if you really comply to the tos of that bonus.https://prnt.sc/Tmeq5YRYBU1FTHis is our team decision and this is final !     -  mean -   we are happy take your money and go away!As I’m asking before. Provide the screenshot of the whole conversation from the start. The support seems explained to you how you violate the bookmaker ToS. I’m interested to see her explanation since he provided it to you based on your latest screenshot.No one here will believe you if you are hiding or censoring the whole conversation to the support because we are all fair here and we need to see both side explanation. dont know how add all conversation here!actually I provided enough information!do you want to hear both sides? Great! I want to hear the other side too! And let the other side answer your questions!Knock on his wall. Ask the bookmaker to comment on his actions!Although I doubt very much that there will be any reaction at all. I don't have any reputation here. I created an account to leave a review.If you want or are trying to play the role of an arbiter, then first bring the defendant here and let him comment on the situation! Otherwise, your comments contain a particle of distrust and trust in the bookmaker in advance!

Now he began to deceive even his only customers!This is what happens when a bad manager runs a company - it closes and deceives all its customers!p.s.  https://prnt.sc/anlkLf5hp0z8Hey there,Please let us know your FJ username so we can accordingly verify the account associated with the case we’re taking about.amperaCheers,fj login - kuklovodinplease do not write to me in private messages here or to the mail linked to the fj account. I want you to answer only here, so that everything is as transparent as possible!And the first thing I would like to start with is to ask you a question:do you admit that you sent me a promo offer in which you ask me to make bets for two days and then receive a bonus freebet on the 3rd day???I also want to note that the promo indicates a bet size of at least 5 mBTC - which is not a small amount at all!p.s. in the continuation of the story. FJ refused to withdraw the rest of my money, saying that according to their rules it is too small for withdrawal - 3.65mbtcSeriously! you break your own rules against me, but refuse to give the rest of the money???in an attempt to raise the balance to the minimum withdrawable amount (yes, I had to continue betting with these scammers), I lost all the remaining money!Well lured me with an offer
